data.title: JS Alternatives

NS Basic/App StudioBasic[commercial] Visual Basic-style BASIC to JavaScript compiler. Includes IDE. Targets iOS and Android

[commercial] Visual Basic-style BASIC to JavaScript compiler. Includes IDE. Targets iOS and Android

qb.jsBasicAn implementation of QBASIC in JavaScriptAn implementation of QBASIC in JavaScript

SpiderbasicBasic

[commercial] SpiderBasic is new web client-side programming language based on established BASIC rules. Its main purpose is to allow development of very complex, windowed based web applications. It provides a large commandset to handle complex and reactive GUI, 2D games, and many more in a coherent manner.

[commercial] SpiderBasic is new web client-side programming language based on established BASIC rules. Its main purpose is to allow development of very complex, windowed based web applications. It provides a large commandset to handle complex and reactive GUI, 2D games, and many more in a coherent manner.

LLVM to JavaScript compiler. LLVM is “an aggressive open-source compiler for C and C++,” as well as other languages.

14427https://github.com/kripken/emscripten

LLVM to JavaScript compiler. LLVM is “an aggressive open-source compiler for C and C++,” as well as other languages.

wispClojure-like

A homoiconic JavaScript dialect with Clojure syntax, S-expressions and macros. Aims to be rich subset of Clojure(Script) that seamlessly interops with both Clojure(Script) and JavaScript. [○](#friends-philosophically-related “this item appears twice in this list; jump to its other instance”)

836https://github.com/Gozala/wisp

A homoiconic JavaScript dialect with Clojure syntax, S-expressions and macros. Aims to be rich subset of Clojure(Script) that seamlessly interops with both Clojure(Script) and JavaScript. [○](#friends-philosophically-related “this item appears twice in this list; jump to its other instance”)

kiClojure-like

ShenErlang

First and yet smallest Erlang JavaScript Compiler based on Erlang AST. It allows you to translate Elixir, Joxa, Lol and Erlang programs to JavaScript with erlc. JavaScript/OTP subset. Has node npm package called erlang-shen-js.

116https://github.com/cultofmetatron/shen

First and yet smallest Erlang JavaScript Compiler based on Erlang AST. It allows you to translate Elixir, Joxa, Lol and Erlang programs to JavaScript with erlc. JavaScript/OTP subset. Has node npm package called erlang-shen-js.

browserlErlangErlang Emulator written in JavaScript77https://github.com/dmatteo/jsdomifyErlang Emulator written in JavaScript

LuvvieScriptErlang

A browser-based dom-scripting language that is a strict sub-set of Erlang which is AST-to-AST transpiled to JavaScript (code )

A browser-based dom-scripting language that is a strict sub-set of Erlang which is AST-to-AST transpiled to JavaScript (code )

LiveScript

Family (share genes with CoffeeScript)

A fork of Coco that is much more compatible with CoffeeScript, more functional, and with more features.1982https://github.com/gkz/livescript

A fork of Coco that is much more compatible with CoffeeScript, more functional, and with more features.

IcedCoffeeScript

Family (share genes with CoffeeScript)

A CoffeeScript dialect that adds support for await and defer keywords which simplify async control flow.732https://github.com/maxtaco/coffee-script

A CoffeeScript dialect that adds support for await and defer keywords which simplify async control flow.

46

Coco

Family (share genes with CoffeeScript)

A CoffeeScript dialect that aims to be more radical and practical, also acts as a test bed for features that get imported in CoffeeScript.

508https://github.com/satyr/coco

A CoffeeScript dialect that aims to be more radical and practical, also acts as a test bed for features that get imported in CoffeeScript.

47

Contracts.coffee

Family (share genes with CoffeeScript)

A dialect of CoffeeScript that adds built-in support for contracts.228https://github.com/disnet/contracts.coffeeA dialect of CoffeeScript that adds built-in support for contracts.

ToffeeScript

Family (share genes with CoffeeScript)

A dialect of CoffeeScript that support Asynchronous Syntax and Regexp operator =~131https://github.com/jiangmiao/toffeescript

A dialect of CoffeeScript that support Asynchronous Syntax and Regexp operator =~

49

Parsec CoffeeScript

Family (share genes with CoffeeScript)

CS based on parser combinators. The project’s aim is to add static metaprogramming (i.e. macros + syntax extensibility) to Coffee Script (CS), similar to how Metalua adds such features to Lua. The resulting compiler, once merged with the official compiler, should be usable as a drop-in replacement for it.

116https://github.com/fab13n/parsec-coffee-script

CS based on parser combinators. The project’s aim is to add static metaprogramming (i.e. macros + syntax extensibility) to Coffee Script (CS), similar to how Metalua adds such features to Lua. The resulting compiler, once merged with the official compiler, should be usable as a drop-in replacement for it.

BlackCoffee

Family (share genes with CoffeeScript)

CoffeeScript with hygienic macros. See also #3171101https://github.com/paiq/blackcoffeeCoffeeScript with hygienic macros. See also #3171

Family (share genes with CoffeeScript)

A CoffeeScript fork that adds type annotations which are compiled to Google closure compiler type annotation comments.
